articles.author: ET Bureau
articles.title: FSIB Recommends Rana Ashutosh for State Bank’s MD Post - The Economic Times
articles.description: Rana Ashutosh Kumar Singh recommended by FSIB for SBI MD post, pending Appointments Committee of the Cabinet approval under PM Modi's leadership. FSIB, led by Bhanu Pratap Sharma, conducted the selection process. Singh currently serves as SBI's deputy MD.

articles.title: SBI Card MILES Credit Cards launched for earning miles on travel - Live From A Lounge
articles.description: SBI Card has entered the "brand-agnostic" sector of cards with its new Miles Credit Card range. The USP is the ability to earn accelerated rewards on travel spends and also a strong suite of transfer partners. That is where the good news ends, or does it?

articles.description: Chennai Petroleum Corp had reported a PAT of Rs 365.28 crore in Q3FY24. On a year-on-year basis, the net profit plunged 38% versus Rs 1,012.81 crore in Q4FY23.
